comments.content:
LIVE could be Gill Sans or many others.  
STRONG is [Linotype Metro Black 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821035621/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/metro-2/metroblack-two/) or [Geometric 415 Black (Bitstream)](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821035621/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/geometric-415/black/)

- Herb
